Name: Hopebearer - Lone Light in the Long Night
AttributesDescription:
Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Resonators deal 15% more total DMG to enemies in Tune Strain - Interfered or Tune Strain - Shifting.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: Here, the light has shed its arrogance and taken a new name: hope.
ObtainedShowDescription: Enemies take 15% more total DMG. Resonators deal 15% more total DMG to enemies in Tune Strain - Interfered or Tune Strain - Shifting.
